description: QuoteMoto-branded 8-second insurance video with advanced techniques

inputs.characterPrompt: Professional insurance agent, 30-35 years old, wearing QuoteMoto blue polo shirt (#0074c9), friendly and trustworthy expression, modern office setting with California insurance marketplace branding

inputs.prompt: Insurance agent smiles confidently at camera and gestures to compare insurance rates. Professional office with QuoteMoto branding visible. Natural, engaging 8-second presentation about California's #1 insurance marketplace.
